hero.description: This is my personal website, here you can find my personal and professional projects, if you want to contact me and learn about me, every day I learn something new there will be an update here.

aboutMe.name: Marco Grimaldo
aboutMe.aboutMeText: I am a passionate full-stack developer skilled in creating modern web applications with React, Node.js, and other cutting-edge technologies. I aim to build scalable and efficient solutions that enhance user experiences. Outside of programming, I enjoy diving into video games and staying active with sports, which sharpens my creativity and teamwork skills.
aboutMe.educationText: Bachelorâ€™s Degree in Computer Systems Engineering
aboutMe.workExpPSL_resume: I work on the development and maintenance of web applications using JavaScript, React, and Node.js. I collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions.
aboutMe.workExpVey_resume: Competent developer in IFS ERP, PL/SQL, .NET, C# and Microsoft Azure. Expert in optimizing business systems and developing solid solutions that improve operational efficiency.
aboutMe.workExpCii_resume: Web developer experienced in React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL, dedicated to building and maintaining dynamic features for the main website. Competent in developing full-stack applications that enhance user interaction and streamline backend processes, ensuring solid, scalable, and efficient web solutions.
